mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE m_status IN (1,11)

select * from (select rownum rn, a.m_name, a.m_empnum, a.m_birth, a.m_phone, a.m_email, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name from (select * from member where m_status IN (1,11) order by m_name) a, position p, department d where a.dpt_code = d.dpt_code and a.pt_code = p.pt_code) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}
select count(*) from address ad, address_group ag where ad.adg_num = ag.adg_num and ad.adg_num = ${adg_num}

select * from (select rownum rn, a.m_name, a.m_empnum, a.m_birth, a.m_phone, a.m_email, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name from (select * from member where m_status IN (1,11) and m_id IN (select ad.m_id from address ad, address_group ag where ad.adg_num = ag.adg_num and ad.adg_num = ${adg_num}) order by m_name) a, position p, department d where a.dpt_code = d.dpt_code and a.pt_code = p.pt_code) where rn >= #{start} and rn <= #{end}

select * from (select rownum rn, a.m_name, a.m_empnum, a.m_birth, a.m_phone, a.m_email, d.dpt_name, p.pt_name from (select * from member where m_status IN (1,11) and m_id IN (select m_id from member where m_name > nchr(#{start_num}) and m_name < nchr(#{end_num})) order by m_name) a, position p, department d where a.dpt_code = d.dpt_code and a.pt_code = p.pt_code)
select count(*) from member where m_name >= nchr(#{start_num}) and m_name < nchr(#{end_num}) and m_status IN (1,11)
mapper.insert: insert into member (m_id, m_name, m_email, m_phone, dpt_code, pt_code, m_status) values (#{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{m_email}, #{m_phone}, 'none', 'none', 11)
